Package net.backlogic.persistence.client

Class DataAccessClient

java.lang.Object
net.backlogic.persistence.client.DataAccessClient
public class DataAccessClient extends Object
The main class of data access client.

    • builder

    • setJwtProvider

      public void setJwtProvider(JwtProvider jwtProvider)
      Set the JWT provider for data access client. If configured, data access client uses this provider to acquire a BEARER token for service authentication. This client has an implementation of JwtProvider in DefaultJwtProvider based on DefaultJwtCredential.
      Parameters:
      jwtProvider - the JWT provide

    • logRequest

      public void logRequest(boolean logRequest)
      Set the logRequest property for data access client for enabling or disabling request logging.
      Parameters:
      logRequest - log request and response if true. Default false.

      Returns:
      a proxy for given interface type. Throws DataAccessException if not annotated properly.
